description: Existing sixth floor slate mansard retained and refurbished with five new lead clad dormer windows to provide additional office accommodation and concealed plant enclosure. External alterations to Blue Bell Yard facade and replacement of all external windows to three elevations (north, south & west). Timber windows rehauled to the existing St James's Street Elevation (east). New plant equipment  at basement and sixth floor level.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
